nodes.text: Kuat-Entralla Drive Yards was a vehicle manufacturing company that built ground vehicles for the First Order and the Sith Eternal. Itself a product of Kuat Drive Yards and its Imperial assets following the defeat of the Galactic Empire, it manufactured the All Terrain Heavy Hauler, the All Terrain MegaCaliber Six, the First Order All Terrain Armored Transport, and the First Order All Terrain Scout Transport.
The presence of Sith loyalists within the executive board of Kuat-Entralla allowed the clandestine funneling of supplies and designs to Exegol through various intermediaries.
